page.title: 18CARNIVALS
page.content: {RUYTON CARNIVAL(CONTD)} by the Ifton Welfare Band followed by the fire engine from Baschurch Fire Station and then comes the Carnival Queen and her attendants. She is followed by eight to ten floats organised by various organisations and local people. The residents of Birch Grove enter one as do the people from Ellbridge. The others are entered by the Church, Sunday School, Ladies Club, Women's Institute, P.G.L. Holiday Centre and one which carries the Carnival Queen. The floats are judged on the field in categories of l. the best decorated, 2. the most original, 3. the most comical, each receiving prizes of Â£2O. The Carnival Queen would have been chosen at a Dance arranged by Mr.D. Jones and held in The Village Hall in June.
